a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: How much global land is used as pasture for livestock?
The extent of global pasture used for livestock grazing. It does not include cropland used to grow animal
Data source: Taylor & Rising (2021); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations; Ellis et al. (2020)
